CustomField.description: Identifies if deal is associated with a foreign national. A foreign national is any person who is not a national of the United States. A national of the United States is an individual that is a U.S. citizen, Lawful permanent resident (green card holder), or “Protected Person” i.e. political asylum holder. Any individual who is present in the U.S. on a temporary immigration visa is considered a Foreign National.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Please confirm whether a foreign national is associated with this deal. A foreign national is any person who is not a national of the United States. A national of the United States is an individual that is a U.S. citizen, lawful permanent resident (green card holder), or “Protected Person” i.e. political asylum holder. Any individual who is present in the U.S. on a temporary immigration visa is considered a foreign national.
CustomField.label: Foreign National
